EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Re: An Introduction to MBO Partners_Jake Levenson 90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Jake,
Will do. I will let you know as soon as I have an update.
Thanks!
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Jake Levenson [mailto:jlevenson@mac.com] Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2012 9:54 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: An Introduction to MBO Partners_Jake Levenson Importance: High
Ok, whatever you need to do. Just keep me posted.
On 1/19/12 12:35 PM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Jake,
Do you have Patrick’s direct line? I want to go over our business model and have a quick chat with him because I can see there is some confusion (which is not uncommon before I directly speak with the client.) If, after speaking with them they absolutely refuse to have MBO sign the contract (which I doubt , but want to be prepared) there is another option. You could sign this document <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Contract_Acknowledgement_Form.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> but that is a last resort as you have less protection and more liability if you sign the contract directly. I think a phone call to Patrick on my end would go a long way and clear everything up.
I will be leaving at 1pm today but just email me and I will get back with you ASAP tomorrow in the am.
Thanks Jake!
___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>

From: Ramage, Patrick [mailto:pramage@ifaw.org] Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2012 11:23 AM To: Sara Conde Cc: jlevenson@mac.com; Smith, Valerie Subject: Re: An Introduction to MBO Partners_Jake Levenson Importance: High
Hi Sarah,
As promised, see the attached accurate draft contract for Jake Levenson.
Patrick
From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Thursday, January 19, 2012 10:05 AM To: Smith, Valerie; Ramage, Patrick; 'Jake Levenson' (jlevenson@mac.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:jlevenson@mac.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> ) Subject: RE: An Introduction to MBO Partners_Jake Levenson Dear Val and Patrick,
My name is Sara Conde and I work with Jake here at MBO Partners. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with you and your organization. I have reviewed the agreement and enclosed the revised version with our information. I have included a copy that lists our changes as well as a clean copy should you accept them for your counter signature.
Here are the list of changes and explination for each one:
Descriptoin of services - Due to our role as an employer or record for tax purposes and not that of a staffing agency we can not attest to the level of skill. Term - We prefer 120 days (6 months) written notice from IFAW. · Fee - The fee is $75 per hour at 35 hours per week. Thus, the budget was updated to reflect this.
If you are curious about MBO Partners and what we do and how we work, we have a short one page overview that may answer some of your questions, which you may access by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> . I look forward to working with you,
Best regards,
Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbUJUvFN%2By%2FWfI76jkCfHEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>

From: Jake Levenson [mailto:jlevenson@mac.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:jlevenson@mac.com%5d&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbUJUvFN%2By%2FWfI76jkCfHEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Saturday, January 07, 2012 12:44 AM To: Valerie, Smith; Patrick Ramage Cc: Steve Arhancet Subject: An Introduction to MBO Partners
Dear Val and Patrick, The reason why I requested an electronic version of the contract to review was because I wanted to review it and introduce you to Steve Arhancet at MBO Partners. MBO Partners handles tax, expense, benefit, payment and contract management for independent consultants. Steve is my contact at MBO Partners that manages my various contracts. I wanted to send a brief introduction as a couple changes in the contract will be needed. His information is below and will be following up shortly. If interested more information can be found at www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcV1co0J4%2BPOXAqTsnHvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
Thanks, Jake
Steven Arhancet MBO Partners 13454 Sunrise Valley Drive Suite 300 Herndon, VA 20171
